verses.roman:
tāra madhye 'bāṅgāla'-kavira nāṭaka-upekṣaṇa
svarūpa-gosāñi kailā vigrahera mahimā-sthāpana

synonyms: tāra madhye—within that chapter; bāṅgāla-kavira—of a poet from Bengal; nāṭaka-upekṣaṇa—the rejection of the drama; svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; kailā—did; vigrahera—of the Deity; mahimā-sthāpana—the establishment of the glories.
translation: Also in that chapter, Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī rejected the drama of a poet from Bengal and established the glories of the Deity.
